name: Sim College: Football
description:
In this game, you take the reigns as the coach of a College Football team.

Recruit players, scheduling future opponents, strategize, train your players and more to ensure your team's future.

Perform well, you may get an increase in salary, or perhaps an offer from a bigger and better team. Perform badly, and you may just find yourself on the hot-seat.

Enter the coaching carousel and test your luck and see if teams see it fit to hire you. Or build a dynasty from a smaller school and rise through the rankings!

THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT. 

Right now there is no way to recruit or control teams.

CURRENT FEATURES INCLUDE:
Ability to simulate a single season.

Computer Generated Rankings.

Randomly Generated Rosters based on Team Reputation.

Schedule, Roster, and Conference View.

Ability to edit Recruits.
